Responsive Image styles

featured (featured)

{% include "@atoms/image/_image.twig" with {
    style: featured,
    placeholder: true
  } %}

Image using paths.images path

{% include "@atoms/image/_image.twig" with {
    variant: 'primary',
    src: paths.images ~'/astrogoat.png'
  } %}

Background Images

SVG

{% include "@atoms/image/_image.twig" with {
    variant: 'bg',
    src: paths.images ~'/ogo.svg',
    alt: 'A friendly goat wearing a space helmet. The Astrogoat!',
    image_classes: 'image--bg'
  } %}

PNG

{% include "@atoms/image/_image.twig" with {
    variant: 'bg',
    src: paths.images ~'/astrogoat.png',
    alt: 'A friendly goat wearing a space helmet. The Astrogoat!',
    image_classes: 'image--bg'
  } %}

svg

SVG Component

Store your SVG files in the SVG subdirectory to have them made available via the _svg--icon.twig partial or using a Css Class.
